swsh.name: Pikachu
swsh.details: Cosplay Pikachu can't be transfered, but the ones wearing Ash's hats can.

visc.name: Pikachu
visc.details: One can be seen following a player in the [second trailer](https://youtube.com/watch?v=TkolOdAX5_I&t=52s).

history.details: Due to a rule change, [overworld Pok√©mon appearing in neutral areas](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G0Uc5YONuso&t=12m32s) are no longer Confirmed.

forms.name: Raichu
forms.details: Requires Alolan forms to be Confirmed to be at least Guaranteed.

history.details: Requires Raichu from Kanto to be Guaranteed or Confirmed, and regional forms to be Confirmed to be at least Possible.
Requires regional forms to be Confirmed to be at least Possible.
Requires Thunder Stone to be Assumed or Confirmed to be at least Guaranteed.
The only Confirmed member of its evolutionary line, [Pikachu](/poke-passport/visc/pikachu), is no longer Confirmed.
Requires Thunder Stone to be Assumed or Confirmed to be at least Guaranteed.
